name: get_quotes_by_specific_author
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_of_quotes.
Tool description: API returns over 50,000+ famous quotes from over 10,000+ great authors and over 350+ different categories.
API description: This API returns the collection of quotes by author you pass in the query params. Maximum you can get 20 quotes at a time and can be customized by *limit*. Our API support pagination and records can be paginated by *page* query param.

author.description: Name of the author whose quotes are to be fetched.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 3.

limit.description: Number of quotes to retrieve per request. Maximum is 20. Defaults to 20.
